title: Dollars or decay
creator_contributor_role: Department of Health Services, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children - Nutrition
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Nutrition
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Nutrition and dental health

description: Illustrates the consequences that a poor or bad diet has on teeth. Attention is especially drawn to food served in school tuckshops. Section on good nutrition habits and how to give children low cost healthy food that they like.
